Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.canoo.webtest.extension.AntWrapper
    since it is not needed at all anymore (Ant tasks are handled transparently)
    com.canoo.webtest.extension.groovy.MacroStepBuilder
    since 11.2006. Use AntBuilder directly
    com.canoo.webtest.security.SunJsseClientAuthConnectionInitializer
    use new config options instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.Step.DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION
    The default is now not to set the value at all.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.canoo.webtest.interfaces.ITableLocator.getId()
    use ITableLocator.getHtmlId() instead
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.locator.TableLocator.getId()
    use TableLocator.setHtmlId(String) instead
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.verify.VerifyElement.getNumberOfHits(Context)
    Use VerifyElement.getNumberOfHits().
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.verify.VerifyText.isExpectedStringPresent(Context)
    Use VerifyText.isExpectedStringPresent()
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.request.ClickLink.locateWebLink(HtmlPage)
    Use AbstractIdOrLabelTarget.findClickableElement(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage) .
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.locator.TableLocator.setId(String)
    use TableLocator.setHtmlId(String) instead
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.request.ClickButton.setIndex(int)
    use setFieldIndex instead
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.form.SetSelectField.setIndex(String)
    use setOptionIndex instead
    com.canoo.webtest.extension.StoreElementAttribute.setPropertyName(String)
    since 03.2007. Use BaseStoreStep.setProperty(String)
    com.canoo.webtest.steps.Step.setStepid(String)
    since June 10 2005. Use ProjectComponent.setDescription(String) (setter should not be removed for compatibility with existing test sequences)
